entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DeAnna4Congress Wow, I can’t tell if he’s more macho than Sylvester Stallone in Rambo or Bruce Willis in Die Hard? Whatta a guy! Sure to keep people safe. Except for the 100,000 dead from COVID19, Black people killed by cops and lynchings, people who can’t afford healthcare, live in poverty etc?
